entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then becoming north 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
